instructions.title: How To Delete Your Linkedin Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Linkedin Account is Easy.  You can do so from your computer browser or from within the mobile app.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my Account?
qnAnswers.answer: When you delete a LinkedIn account, it doesnâ€™t mean that all your data is immediately wiped from its backup drives.  Your information is retained as long as necessary to comply with legal obligations after deletion.  Plus, if you log in within 30 days of Deleting your Account you have the choice to reactivate your account back to your previous settings. If you would like your information deleted sooner you can contact customer service by [clicking here] (https://www.linkedin.com/help/linkedin/solve) and your request will be answered within 30 days.

qnAnswers.question: Can I download my data from Linkedin before I delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes.  Linkedin provides you with a downloaded copy of your data as long as you request it. To download your Linkedin data please [click here] (https://www.linkedin.com/psettings/member-data).

qnAnswers.question: I have two Linkedin Account and I want to delete on. What do I do?
qnAnswers.answer: To learn how to delete or merge a duplicate account please [click here] (https://www.linkedin.com/help/linkedin/answer/1275).

qnAnswers.question: I forgot my password. Can I still delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: No. If you don't recall your Linkedin password you can email Linkedin technical support [here] (https://www.linkedin.com/uas/request-password-reset) and they will assist you in locating your account informaiton.

steps: Log onto the [Linkedin Website] (https://www.linkedin.com/feed/).  If you are already logged in, doing so will open your Linkedin homepage.
Click the Profile Icon on Top Right
Choose a Reason for Deletion then Type a Deletion Request then Click Next
Verify Password then Click Close Account
This is the Confirmation Message you receive once your Account has been Closed

slides.alt: Linkedin-Delete Account from Website. Step 1: Log onto the [Linkedin Website] (https://www.linkedin.com/feed/).  If you are already logged in, doing so will open your Linkedin homepage.

steps: Scroll Down and Tap Close Account
Tap I have Privacy Concerns then Tap Next

slides.alt: Linkedin-Delete Account from iOS. Step 1: Tap Linkedin App

slides.title: Profile Icon

slides.alt: Linkedin-Delete Account from iOS. Step 3: Tap Settings Gear Top Right
